trans-unit.source: Provides static methods used to draw user interface elements on activity designer surfaces.
This class cannot be inherited.
Draws a 3-dimensional button on the activity designer surface.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> on which to draw the 3-dimensional button.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to draw on the button.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that defines the bounds of the button.
The single-precision floating-point number to specify the transparency level of the button.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ButtonState"></xref> enumeration value to specify the appearance of the button.
graphics contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
Draws a button that is used to expand and collapse composite designers on the activity designer surface.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> on which to draw the button.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that defines the bounds of the button.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to draw an expanded button; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme"></xref> associated with the activity designer used to render the button.
graphics or compositeDesignerTheme contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).

Draws an image on the activity designer surface by using a <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>, an <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref>, a <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>, and a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerContentAlignment"></xref>.
When you use this version of DrawImage, the source rectangle is set to the size, in pixels, of the image, the transparency setting is set to 1.0f, and drawing grayscales is not allowed.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> on which to draw the image.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to draw.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that defines the bounds of the image to draw.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerContentAlignment"></xref> that specifies how the image is aligned in the bounding rectangle.
graphics, image, or destination contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).

Draws an image on the activity designer surface by using a <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>, an <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref>, a source and destination <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>, an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerContentAlignment"></xref>, a single-precision floating-point number, and a Boolean value.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> on which to draw the image.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to draw.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that defines the bounds of the image.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that defines the source of the image.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerContentAlignment"></xref> that specifies how the image is aligned in the bounding rectangle.
A single-precision floating-point number that defines the transparency settings for the image.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to draw the image in grayscales; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
graphics, image, destination, or source contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
-or- transparency is less than 0, or greater than 1.0f.
Draws a rounded rectangle on the activity designer surface.
DrawRoundedRectangle uses the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.GetRoundedRectanglePath%2A> method to obtain the path to draw.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> on which to draw the rectangle.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> to draw the rectangle.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that defines the bounds of the rounded rectangle.
The integer value of the radius to use for the rounded edges.
graphics or drawingPen contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
Draws text on the activity designer surface.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> on which to draw the text.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> used to draw the text
The text to draw.
The bounding <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> in which the text must be drawn.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.StringAlignment"></xref> that specifies where the text is aligned in the bounding rectangle.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.TextQuality"></xref> that specifies the quality setting to draw the text.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> to draw the text.
graphics, font, text, or textBrush contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
Returns the graphics path used to draw the specified rounded rectangle.
The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawRoundedRectangle%2A> method uses GetRoundedRectanglePath to obtain the path to draw.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> for which to obtain the graphics path.
An integer that defines the radius to use to draw the rounded corners.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref> that draws the rounded path of the specified rectangle.
rectangle is set to .
-- or -- radius is less than or equal to 0.
